author: Fextralife
description:
First Berserker Khazan BEHIND THE SCENES - Director Interview
Pre-order The First Berserker Khazan now - https://khazan.nexon.com/
Thanks to Nexon and Neople for Sponsoring this video!

In this The First Berserker Khazan video, We have some behind-the-scenes information as we have the opportunity do to an interview with the creative of the title and ask them some things that you probably wouldn't have the opportunity to ask. If you guys are curious to learn more about the background of Khazan, why it is the way it is, and how it came to be, then i think you guys would really enjoy this video

Wiki:https://firstberserkerkhazan.wiki.fextralife.com/First+Berserker+Khazan+Wiki

Timestamps:
0:00 - The First Berserker Khazan Interview
0:49 - Why Khazan?
3:25 - Other Characters considered for the main protagonist
3:52 - Surge of Korean Gaming
5:45 - Berserk Inspiration
7:12 - Dungeon and Fighter Universe Lore
9:29 - Khazan's Comrades
11:07 - Khazan Syndrome
12:36 - Khazan and Blade Phantom
title: First Berserker Khazan BEHIND THE SCENES - Director Interview
